shortdesc.ph: Starts the audio device loopback test.

section.p: This method tests whether the local audio sampling device and playback device are working properly. After calling this method, the audio sampling device samples the local audio, and the audio playback device plays the sampled audio. The SDK will trigger two callbacks at the set time interval to report the volume information of the audio capture device (uid = 0) and the audio playback setting (uid = 1) respectively.

ul.li: Ensure that you call this method before joining a channel.
This method tests local audio devices and does not report the network conditions.

pd.p: The interval between SDK triggering callbacks, in milliseconds. We recommend a setting greater than 200 ms. It should not be less than 10 milliseconds, otherwise the callback will not be received.
